Job Title: Solar Engineer

Location: Chicago, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Description

Solar Engineer - Design a Brighter Future (On-Site or Fully Remote)

We are seeking a passionate Solar Engineer to join our growing team and play a key role in shaping the future of renewable energy. We design, procure, and construct innovative electrical power solutions for data centers, renewable energy projects, and microgrids.

In this role, you will leverage your expertise in solar energy to design and engineer solar photovoltaic (PV) systems for our clients. This is a unique opportunity to work with a team of industry leaders on cutting-edge projects that are transforming the power grid.

About

Do you thrive in a collaborative environment and enjoy tackling complex challenges? Are you passionate about sustainability and want to make a real impact? If so, we want to hear from you!The Opportunity:

Design and engineer solar PV systems using industry-standard software like PVsystDevelop electrical drawings and single-line diagrams for solar projectsCollaborate with engineers, project managers, and other team members to ensure successful project executionSupport project proposals and requests for quotations (RFQs)Stay up-to-date on the latest advancements in solar technologyPotential for travel to project sites (limited for senior engineers)

 Qualifications: 

The Ideal Candidate

Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience)5+ years of experience in Solar Engineering (for senior role; less experience considered for on-site Chicago position)Proven experience in PV system design using software like PVsystProficiency in electrical design principles and software (AutoCAD, Revit a plus)Excellent communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skillsStrong work ethic, with the ability to manage multiple tasks effectivelyA passion for renewable energy and sustainability

 Why is This a Great Opportunity: 

Compensation And Benefits

Competitive salary commensurate with experience ($80,000 - $100,000)Comprehensive benefits package including medical, dental, vision insurance, 401(k) match, profit sharing, and yearly bonusesOpportunity to work on challenging and rewarding projects with a growing industry leaderFamily-oriented company culture with a focus on work-life balanceFor Senior Engineers (5+ years experience): Enjoy the flexibility of a fully remote position with occasional travel to project sites.For Junior Engineers (less than 5 years experience): Gain valuable hands-on experience working on-site in our Chicago office.

Salary Type : Annual Salary

Salary Min : $ 80000

Salary Max : $ 100000

Currency Type : USD

]]>

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
